articles.title: Robots could soon look human, with living skin and hair - CNN Video
articles.description: Researchers in Tokyo have grown human-like, living skin on a robotic finger, with plans to make the skin self-sustaining by adding veins, and later hair, nails and sweat glands. CNN's Pamela Brown reports.

articles.title: See the PGA's ultimate sky bar
articles.description: People can watch the PGA Tour now with a bird's eye view. This sky bar hoists 22 people up in a crane overlooking the Canadian Open for 30 minutes at a time -- and yes, they serve drinks.

articles.title: Watch how pro-Trump personalities covered the prime-time January 6 hearing
articles.description: Fox News chose not to carry the prime-time January 6 congressional hearing live Thursday night. Other conservative media, like Newsmax, aired the hearing but tried to spin the coverage. Here are some moments that highlight the splintering media landscape.
